meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>West</kanji> <kanji>side</kanji> of something is known as the <vocabulary>West</vocabulary> or the <vocabulary>West side</vocabulary>. Sorry, I have no story to go along with your West side.
readingMnemonic: The readings are the kun'yomi vocab readings. You should know both of them, with 西 being にし and 側 being がわ (what you learned with the kanji).
